page.title: 12REETH BRASS BAND,
page.content: The Band was first started over a hundred years ago,about 1885.There are now about 18 people in the Band.The man who has been playing in the Band the longest is Mr. James Kendal They play five different instruments in the Band .The oldest instrument is the{B}Bass,it is about 80_90 years old. Mr. Woodward,who we interviewed for the information, likes to play the Euphonium best. The Band play at local events such as Reeth Show and Sports,Band Concerts and Garden Fetes for the R.D.C. They practice once a week on a Tuesday night.They wear a uniform when they perform.Their favourite pieces of music are modern musicals,and marches. They also have a Junior Band and we, Sharon and David, play in it.
